Michael Moore you did it! Went to see your movie last night and it was moving, inspiring and enlightening. Amazing! i think it is your best work to date. Don't let these haters who cannot open their minds enough to see that being critical of your country is the only way to make it better. It is actually because you LOVE our country so much that you are trying to bring this into the light so we can fix it! Thank you for doing what you do. It is people like you that have helped make this country what it is today!

Rose, it cost 24 bail to close the govt unnecessarily for a temper tantrum. We were forced to sign over liens to vast tracts of America to China TO COVER OUR DEBTS if we default. Its not an option. Time for repubs to grow up and act like real adults and care for our land and our people.

Israel intensifies crackdown on media Israel¡¯s military and domestic intelligence agency wasted no time implementing a decision by the cabinet last Thursday to sharply intensify the crackdown on Palestinian media.Before dawn on Friday, agents from the Shin Bet, accompanied by Israeli soldiers, raided the Ramallah offices of Palestine Today, confiscating the TV station¡¯s equipment before ordering it closed until futher notice. During the raid, the soldiers briefly detained two of the station¡¯s journalists, Muhammad Amro and Shbeib Shbeib. The International Federation of Journalists (IFJ) sharply condemned the closures. ¡°We cannot tolerate these continuous attacks from Israeli authorities to muzzle Palestinian press,¡± the group¡¯s president Jim Boumelha said. He added that accusations of incitement and the closure of media offices must not occur without due process. Haim Shibi, a member of the foreign relations committee of the National Federation of Israeli Journalists, accused Boumelha of ¡°turning the IFJ into a clear anti-Israel propaganda tool, continually portraying the IDF [Israeli army] as an army that hunts journalists, targets them and kills them.¡±

Mexico is not a bad place it depends what you do and who you hang with . . for me I've been to mexicali, Tijuana, guanajuato, Guadalajara, and many more places . . and there's nothing bad going on . . it disappoints me when I ask people have you been to Mexico and they reply no and I'll never go there . . it's scary or I'll get kidnapped by the cartel . . It depends who you know and what you do that causes that attention . . Mexico is a safe beautiful place. <ed> <ed> I'm proud to be 100% Latina <ed> <ed>
